oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Innovation Research in High-Value Commodity Chains: Lessons Learned
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jensen, Henning Høgh Jensen
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Research methodology and philosophy
Produce chain management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This poster reports on the learnings obtained from an ongoing research project conducted in Kenya, Tanzania and Uganda. The focus is high value chain and how research can be conducted in innovations along the chain.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Jensen, Henning Høgh Jensen (2013) Innovation Research in High-Value Commodity Chains: Lessons Learned. Poster at: Agricultural Innovation Systems in Africa, Nairobi, Kenya, 28. Maj - 31. June 2013.
